sentences.en: And on your left, you have Tyrannosaurus Rex, a carnivore from the Jurassic period.
sentences.cn: 在您的左边, 您看到的是暴龙, 一种来自侏罗纪的肉食动物.

sentences.en: At the end of the Jurassic there occurred a transient compression event.
sentences.cn: 侏罗纪末期发生过短暂的挤压事件.

sentences.en: Coal measures in Xiaonan coalmine belong to Jurassic terrestrial deposit.
sentences.cn: 晓南煤矿含煤地层属侏罗系陆相沉积.

sentences.en: I could imagine them as Jurassic dinosaurs and me really being scared.
sentences.cn: 我可以想象它们是侏罗纪恐龙,而我真的被它们吓着.

sentences.en: Is Jurassic Chaidamu Basin a Foreland Basin?

sentences.en: Nick: Well, along with Jurassic Park!

sentences.en: Okay , now the Mastodon is from the semi - late Jurassic period.
sentences.cn: 接下来这头乳齿象是来自侏罗纪中后期.

sentences.en: Taibei Say was the depositional center of Turpan - Harmi Basin after Jurassic.
sentences.cn: 台北凹陷在侏罗纪以后成为吐哈盆地的沉积中心.

sentences.en: There are high quality coal resources in Jurassic strata of Ordos Basin.
